Team","details":"Implements CEI pattern, reentrancy guards, and competitive bidding Features: - Multiple agents/workers can bid on a single bounty - Client selects winner from bids - Automatic refund of escrowed funds to client on completion - 48-hour auto-release after deliverable submission - Dispute mechanism with arbitration support - ERC-8004 reputation integration for bidder discovery Security: - CEI (Checks-Effects-Interactions) pattern throughout - OpenZeppelin ReentrancyGuard on all state-changing functions - Explicit access control and state validation - Safe ERC20 operations with SafeERC20 - Comprehensive event logging","errors":{"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract)."}],"AddressInsufficientBalance(address)":[{"details":"The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation."}],"FailedInnerCall()":[{"details":"A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC20 token failed."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"approveDeliverable(uint256)":{"details":"Follows CEI pattern with platform fee deduction","params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"}},"assignWorker(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Refunds excess escrow amount to client. Follows CEI pattern.","params":{"bidIndex":"Index of the winning bid","bountyId":"The bounty identifier"}},"autoReleasePayment(uint256)":{"details":"Can be called by anyone after the time window passes","params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"}},"canAutoRelease(uint256)":{"params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"},"returns":{"canRelease":"True if auto-release is available"}},"cancelBounty(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by client before assignment. Follows CEI pattern.","params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"}},"createBounty(address,uint256,uint256,string,bool)":{"details":"Client escrows full amount upfront. Excess refunded when winner selected.      Follows CEI pattern for security.","params":{"deadline":"Timestamp when bidding closes","escrowAmount":"Maximum amount willing to pay (client locks this)","paymentToken":"ERC20 token address (e.g., USDC)","requirementsURI":"IPFS hash of bounty requirements","useUMAArbitration":"True to use UMA OOv3, false for SimpleArbitrator"},"returns":{"bountyId":"The newly created bounty ID"}},"disputeDeliverable(uint256,string,string)":{"details":"Creates dispute case in arbitrator contract","params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier","evidenceURI":"IPFS URI of client's evidence","reason":"Description of the dispute"}},"disputeDeliverableWithUMA(uint256,string,string,uint256)":{"details":"Creates UMA assertion that will be resolved after liveness period or challenge","params":{"bond":"Bond amount for the assertion (in payment token)","bountyId":"The bounty identifier","claim":"Human-readable claim describing the dispute","evidenceURI":"IPFS URI of client's evidence"}},"getActiveBids(uint256)":{"params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"},"returns":{"activeBids":"Array of active bids"}},"getBid(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"bidIndex":"Index of the bid","bountyId":"The bounty identifier"},"returns":{"bid":"Complete bid data"}},"getBidCount(uint256)":{"params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"},"returns":{"count":"Number of bids"}},"getBounty(uint256)":{"params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"},"returns":{"bounty":"Complete bounty struct data"}},"resolveDispute(uint256)":{"details":"Callable by anyone after arbitrator has resolved the case","params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"}},"resolveUMADispute(uint256)":{"details":"Callable by anyone after UMA assertion is resolved","params":{"bountyId":"The bounty identifier"}},"submitBid(uint256,uint256,string)":{"details":"No funds locked from bidder. Client chooses winner.","params":{"bidAmount":"Amount the bidder is willing to accept (must be <= escrow)","bountyId":"The bounty identifier","proposalURI":"IPFS hash of the bid approveDeliverable(uint256).details: Follows CEI pattern with platform fee deduction

assignWorker(uint256,uint256).details: Refunds excess escrow amount to client. Follows CEI pattern.

autoReleasePayment(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone after the time window passes

cancelBounty(uint256).details: Only callable by client before assignment. Follows CEI pattern.

createBounty(address,uint256,uint256,str.details: Client escrows full amount upfront. Excess refunded when winner selected.      Follows CEI pattern for security.

params.escrowAmount: Maximum amount willing to pay (client locks this)
params.useUMAArbitration: True to use UMA OOv3, false for SimpleArbitrator

disputeDeliverable(uint256,string,string.details: Creates dispute case in arbitrator contract

disputeDeliverableWithUMA(uint256,string.details: Creates UMA assertion that will be resolved after liveness period or challenge

params.bond: Bond amount for the assertion (in payment token)

resolveDispute(uint256).details: Callable by anyone after arbitrator has resolved the case

resolveUMADispute(uint256).details: Callable by anyone after UMA assertion is resolved

submitBid(uint256,uint256,string).details: No funds locked from bidder. Client chooses winner.

params.bidAmount: Amount the bidder is willing to accept (must be <= escrow)
params.proposalURI: IPFS hash of the bid proposal

params.deliverableURI: IPFS or storage URI of the completed work

withdrawBid(uint256,uint256).details: Only bidder can withdraw their own bid, only before assignment

params.bidIndex: Index of the bid to withdraw

AUTO_RELEASE_WINDOW().notice: Time window for client to approve/dispute after submission (48 hours)

approveDeliverable(uint256).notice: Client approves deliverable and releases payment

arbitrator().notice: Arbitrator contract address for dispute resolution

assignWorker(uint256,uint256).notice: Client assigns bounty to a winning bidder

bounties(uint256).notice: Mapping from bounty ID to bounty data

canAutoRelease(uint256).notice: Check if bounty can be auto-released

createBounty(address,uint256,uint256,str.notice: Create a new bounty with escrowed funds

disputeCases(uint256).notice: Mapping from bounty ID to arbitration case ID (SimpleArbitrator)

disputeDeliverableWithUMA(uint256,string.notice: Client disputes submitted deliverable using UMA Optimistic Oracle

getActiveBids(uint256).notice: Get all active (non-withdrawn) bids for a bounty

getBidCount(uint256).notice: Get total number of bids for a bounty

nextBountyId().notice: Counter for generating unique bounty IDs

resolveDispute(uint256).notice: Resolve a disputed bounty based on arbitrator decision

resolveUMADispute(uint256).notice: Resolve UMA dispute based on Escalation Manager decision

submitBid(uint256,uint256,string).notice: Submit a bid for an open bounty

umaAssertionIds(uint256).notice: Mapping from bounty ID to UMA assertion ID

updateUMAEscalationManager(address).notice: Update UMA Escalation Manager address (owner only)

withdrawBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw a bid before winner is assigned
